LanguageData.MechanoidTerraformer.label: 奇怪的人工造物
LanguageData.MechanoidTerraformer.description: This strange artifact seems to modify the local weather. You should send someone to study it. Be careful however, this thing stinks mechanoid technology...
LanguageData.MechanoidPylon.label: 机械转化器节点
LanguageData.MechanoidPylon.description: A mechanoid pylon, used to harness the sky's power. It seems to be protected by a shield powered by the terraformer.
LanguageData.MechanoidPylonDestructible.label: 机械转化器节点
LanguageData.MechanoidPylonDestructible.description: A mechanoid pylon, used to harness the sky's power. It seems to be protected by a shield powered by the terraformer.
